Breast Cancer Detection using Thermography DMR-IR

This document excerpt describes a breast cancer detection project using thermography and DMR-IR. It imports necessary libraries, sets up the dataset path and categories, and creates a pandas DataFrame to store image paths and labels.

Key Concepts:

  • Breast Cancer Detection
  • Thermography in Breast Cancer Diagnosis
